title: sn change?
content:
Hey, just wondering, is it possible for me to change my screen name?  
Who would be my best bet to talk to about that?

Or should i just create a new account?
author: victor ivanov

comments.content: I can help you. [Email me](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015003116/http:/typophile.com/user/108/contact) and tell me what name you want.
